name: congressionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
by the US Congress: The agency has to keep spending within its congressionally approved budget. State officials want to extend a congressionally imposed ban on drilling for oil.
More examplesFewer examplesEnvironmental campaigners want this area to become a congressionally designated wilderness.The congressionally approved measures will come into effect next month.The congressionally chartered programme has produced more than 300 graduates over the last twenty years. The congressionally mandated committee is due to present its findings this week.
